ch0113_41_mikan/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s have fun today and make it the most special
and wonderful day we can.
ch0113_41_mikan/7101_0701_01_10:
When you’re walking in the dark at night and
see a light in the distance, don’t you feel a 
sense of relief?
ch0113_41_mikan/7101_0701_02_10:
A gently shining light is like a guide you
can trust...
ch0113_41_mikan/7101_0701_03_10:
But maybe it also shines on our hearts and warms
them up.
ch0113_41_mikan/7101_0701_04_10: Anyway, that’s just a thought I had.
ch0113_41_mikan/7102_0701_01_10: Ampharos is a really hard worker.
ch0113_41_mikan/7102_0701_02_10:
She always tries so hard to get stronger, even if
just by a little bit... She’ll even take on Steelix
in battle.
ch0113_41_mikan/7102_0701_03_10:
Whenever I see her do that, I feel like I’ve got to
work just as hard. It gives me a lot of motivation!
ch0113_41_mikan/7103_0701_01_10:
I got dressed up in fancy clothes for this special
day. What do you think?
ch0113_41_mikan/7103_0701_02_10: Out in town, I really stand out...
ch0113_41_mikan/7103_0701_03_10: But at a time like this, it’s OK to stand out, right?
ch0113_41_mikan/7104_0701_01_10:
Having a party together with everyone is so
exciting, isn’t it?
ch0113_41_mikan/7104_0701_02_10:
Seeing people and Pokémon having fun really puts
a smile on my face.
ch0113_41_mikan/7104_0701_03_10:
And... Well...parties also have lots of good
food, right?
ch0113_41_mikan/7105_0701_01_10:
I’m planning to put up lights in town to make
things feel really special.
ch0113_41_mikan/7105_0701_02_10:
I really want everyone to feel like they can have a
good time...
ch0113_41_mikan/7105_0701_03_10:
Would you like to help me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0113_41_mikan/1701_0701_02_10: I hope it’s something that will be precious to you.
ch0113_41_mikan/1701_0702_01_10: If you like my present, I’ll be very happy...
ch0113_41_mikan/2501_0701_01_10:
A lot of port towns—in the Johto region and
elsewhere—have lighthouses.
ch0113_41_mikan/2501_0701_02_10:
Whenever I see a lighthouse, I just can’t help but
stop by and visit.
ch0113_41_mikan/2501_0701_03_10:
Now that I think about it, there’s a lighthouse on
Pasio, too, isn’t there?
ch0113_41_mikan/2501_0702_01_10:
Is there somewhere that’s special to you? Some
kind of place or store you always feel a need
to visit?
ch0113_41_mikan/2501_0702_02_10:
If there is, maybe you could share it with me?
You don’t have to tell me now—it could be later!
But...I’d like that.
ch0113_41_mikan/2511_0701_01_10:
When I look at my Ampharos, she reminds me of
Amphy from Olivine City’s lighthouse.
ch0113_41_mikan/2511_0701_02_10:
Amphy shone its light out to sea, keeping
ships safe.
ch0113_41_mikan/2511_0701_03_10:
I hope my Ampharos can be a light that protects
others, just like Amphy.
ch0113_41_mikan/2511_0702_01_10:
I, at least, feel safe when I’m together
with Ampharos.
ch0113_41_mikan/2511_0702_02_10:
That’s because her warm light feels like it’s
reaching out and giving me a big hug...
ch0113_41_mikan/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning. I hope you have a wonderful day...
And I hope the same for everyone else, too!
ch0113_41_mikan/3003_0701_01_10:
I’ll do my best to finish setting up all my light
decorations during the daytime.
ch0113_41_mikan/3005_0701_01_10:
Tonight, the city lights are more radiant than ever
before... And so are everyone’s smiles!
